Description:
Model
Brand: Corsair

Model: CSSD-F1000GBMP600ECS
Device Type: Internal Solid State Drive (SSD)
Used For: Consumer


Details
Form Factor: M.2 2280
Capacity: 1TB
Memory Components: 3D TLC
Interface: PCI-Express 4.0 x4, NVMe 1.4
Controller: PS5027-E27T
Encryption: AES 256-bit encryption


Performance
Max Sequential Read: Up to 7000 MBps
Max Sequential Write: Up to 6200 MBps
4KB Random Read: Up to 1,000,000 IOPS
4KB Random Write: Up to 1,000,000 IOPS
Terabytes Written (TBW): 600TB
MTBF: 1,500,000 hours
HeatSink: Yes


Features
Features: The CORSAIR MP600 ELITE PCIe Gen4 x4 NVMe M.2 SSD for PS5 provides high-performance storage expansion optimized for the PlayStation® 5. Go beyond 

the speed of the internal PS5 SSD with PCIe Gen4 technology that achieves sequential read speeds up to 7,000MB/sec and sequential write speeds of up to 

6,500MB/sec, so game files load faster than ever. The M.2 2280 form-factor and pre-installed low-profile aluminum heatsink enable the MP600 ELITE to fit 

directly into your PlayStation 5’s M.2 slot, while meeting or exceeding all PS5 M.2 requirements. Backed by a comprehensive five-year warranty, the MP600 

ELITE steps up your PS5 storage.


Environmental
Power Consumption (Idle): < 50 mW
Power Consumption (Active): Active Read: 5.6W
Active Write: 8.5W
Operating Temperature: 0°C ~ +70°C
Storage Temperature: -40°C ~ +85°C
Operating Humidity: 40°C 90% RH
Max Shock Resistance: 1500G
Max Vibration Resistance: 20Hz~80Hz/1.52mm


Dimensions & Weight
Height: 9.00mm
Width: 24.00mm
Depth: 80mm
Weight: 31.57g
Label: SSD M.2 Corsair MP600 Elite For PS5 1TB White
